1.content:
Scarlett was going about her day around the house when her daughter violet runs up to her holding a golden ticket. "look mother, i found one of the 5 golden tickets!" Violet was yelling, "Calm down sweetie, that's great but your a gum chewer so why did you buy one of the chocolate bars" Scarlett asked Violet. "To see if i could get a ticket" Violet said in a sassy tone and walked off to her room. It had been a while since Scarlett had the chance to be on tv since violet hadn't broken any chewing records of late, so Scarlett told her daughter she'll be the parent going on the tour with her.

Upon arriving at the factory gates with Violet, Scarlett unzipped her tracksuit a little to reveal a little bit of her cleavage and her bra for the cameras.

1314.content:
"As nice as it is he can focus on his hobbies..." Scarlett murmured to herself as she wandered down the lengthy hallway, noting its oddly tubular design and large scale. Why, she could have sworn a trailer-truck could pass by with little effort with all the space provided. "...I'll just never understand his odd antics. What a terribly strange man, that Wonka." Shaking her head, she marched herself down the remaining length of hall, passing between a vault-esque door and ito the azure-tinted lights of her destination.

Inside were a great assortment of vats and hoses, each jerry-rigged with at least a half-dozen pipes going this way and that towards the many sectors of the factory. From small port windows, Scarlett could see richly colored fluids bubbling and roiling about inside the vats, many running shades of yellow, red and orange. Vats farther back revealed ore exotic colors, like greens and blues of varying shades. And farther still in the depths of the room looked to be massive stalls, even larger than the hallway she had so easily passed through.

"Just what is a place like this?" she pondered aloud, strolling between the vats. Dozens of the tiny workers fidgeted with dials and knobs, each working hard to ensure the fluid was being regulated or filtered or whatever was needed at the very moment.

"Simply marvelous, isn't it?" A familiar voice called from behind her.

"Ah~ M-mr. Wonka!"

"In the flesh. May you seemed to have wandered rather far from the tour."

"I-i'm afraid I got rather lost looking after something," Scarlett bluffed, hoping ot to lose favor with the wild candymaer. Anything to keep her precious daughter at the head of the pack.

"I certainly hope it's been found. I'd hate for anything important to get lost on a tour, what with how many rooms it could wander into and get caught up in," Wonka nodded.

"I couldn't agree more."

"Still, you've stumbled into one of my modern marvels here: my personal Juicing Room!"

"Juicing Room?" Scarlett crinkled her brow slightly. "So, for fruits then I take it?"

"Not just fruits, but anything that truly has a juicy center," Wonka explained, pointing his cane towards a few vats of varying vegetable juices. "But fruits do tend to be the most common thing. Perhaps you'd be interested in a demonstration then?"

135134.content:
"Like what you see Kiddo?" Scarlett giggled, drawing herself close to the young lad as he tried to swallow, a small nod and hot blush spoke more than any words he could find. "Good~ You know, it's a lot of fun being such a fun Mother like me, getting to share all these wonderful assets with little cuties like you. But, something tells me you want more than just to look, right?"

Again, Charlie could only nod slowly, his mind racing with what was presented before him. Never had he dreamed such a sculpted and well endowed woman would be the object of his affection, but here she was in all her stunning tracksuited glory.

"Hehe~ You're such a good boy. And good boys deserve to have something very special," Scarlett continued, kneeling down before his with puckered lips.

"Mother? Mother! Where are you?" Called out a familiar voice. The motherly figure turned on her heels as her loving champion of a daughter Violet approached from the main Inventing Room. "There, you are! Why the heck did you run off Mom?"

"W-well Violet, you see-"

"And why do you have that loser hanging out with you? He's not trying to bribe you with his petty talk, is he?"

"No, far from it Violet. We were just so...interested in all the little things in this place, we thought we'd get a closer look at a few things," Scarlett tried to explain, ignoring the fact she was more than happy to let Violet attend to her own devices while she had fun with her new toy. Her jaws still slowly smacked away at the gum, her busom and bottom inching out a smidge at a time.

"Whatever you say Mom. By the by, you might wanna zip up a little. I know we're the eye candy of this tour, but you're being a bit obvious," Violet chided, turning back around towards the door. "Come on, the tour is gonna leave for another room soon."

"What's the rush Honey? Besides, there's plenty of fun to be had right here, why," Scarlett glanced around, looking for something to entice Violet to play along. "Why just try some of this~"

"Enjoying yourself cutie?" Scarlett giggled, feeling the young lad snuggle deeper into her blown up cleavage as she continued to feel the mysterious helium expand her form. Soft sounds of rubbery squeaks began to emit from her form as she felt his wandering hands explore her rounded middle.

"I-it's incredible! You're blowing up...j-just like a balloon!" he stammered, his cheeks rosy from his own emotional confusion. Never had he thought a hot, mily woman would be interested in him, much less one who would feed into his quiet desires for a balloon of a woman at that.

"Heh, I am, aren't I? It feels so nice, you stroking me and enjoying all that a woman like me has to offer~ But you know," Scarlett cooed, more changes overcoming her mind as she let out a lusty moan. "I've got plenty more than just a pair of fun balloons up front~"

"Y-you're being a bit silly Mrs. Beauregarde."

"Please, just call me Scarlett," the matriarch purred, euphoric feelings bobbing around her brain like freshly blown up balloons hitting a ceiling. "And just what do you mean?"

"W-well...balloons don't have boobs~" Charlie blushed, watching as Scarlett's assets began to retreat into her form, her skin growing slick and rubbery like latex. Growing larger still, Scarlett could only watch as she grew more and more into an actual balloon, a nozzle being tied shut forming at her crotch as her body swelled away.

"Wh-what's happening to me? Why does it feel so good?" she pondered aloud, still letting out little mewls of pleasure.
